Summary: Bright White Light Orb Seen over Myrtle Beach, SC
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on the beach at north myrtle beach, sc around 9:54pm looking south east. i looked towards the sky to my left which is (east) and noticed a bright light in the sky. i thought it was a plane as there are usually planes coming into the airport with their lights on. i then looked back about 3 seconds later and focused more attention on the light, but i did not see any blinking lights so it could have not been a plane. i grabbed my camera and tried to take some video. sorry the video is so shaky but it was the first time i had used a video camera at night and as you probably already know its not easy to focus and remain still without a tripod. the camera is a sony hdr cx160. it has a 30x optical zoom and a 350x digital zoom. i was using the 30 frames per sec setting on hd 1080i. as you can see from the video when i get the darn thing into view the orb or light is very bright. it's actually better to view the entire video in slow motion frame by frame. once i finally got the light into view it appeared to accelerate away from me very fast so i zoomed in. it appeared on the screen to come back into view (from the zoom) and then started to disappear again further away from me. i then used the digital zoom at this time but the image got blurry as you can see from the video and then disappeared. not sure what it was but i did not see any blinking lights on it as a plane would have. any ideas? i also have a video that's about 50 meg. where do i send it to? [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg]
